full_text:
Palm Beach House Workers

Full time workers
John and Mary Alessi
561 309 (p)
561 366 (h)
Jerome Pierre (Gardener)
561 547 (h)
Works Monday to Friday at approx. 2pm - 5pm (after working for Alan Stopeck)
If Mr. Epstein is in town he comes at 6.30am to clear debris away from pool deck and patio's and leaves for the day.

Part time workers
Francis and Pastora Peadon (Cleaners)
561 833
Wednesday 8am - 4.30pm also Thursday when requested
Emmy Tayler
917 972 (p)
561 694 (h)
Alan Stopeck (Landscape designer)
561 793 (w)
He does not come at a regular time. He arrives, checks the garden and leaves

GOVERNMENT EXHIBIT 418-R S2 20 Cr. 330 (AJN)
DOJ-OGR-00015666
